channel.title: CVE Feed for STMicroelectronics STM32Cube -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for STMicroelectronics STM32Cube -- all products

item.title: CVE-2021-42553|2024-08-04T03:38:49.280Z -- stmicroelectronics%20stm32cube -- stm32%20usb%20host%20library
item.description: A buffer overflow vulnerability in stm32_mw_usb_host of STMicroelectronics in versions before 3.5.1 allows an attacker to execute arbitrary code when the descriptor contains more endpoints than USBH_MAX_NUM_ENDPOINTS. The library is typically integrated when using a RTOS such as FreeRTOS on STM32 MCUs.
